TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Keyboard extends System.Object
public ref class Keyboard abstract sealed

summary.span: 代表鍵盤裝置。

span.span: Represents the keyboard device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供鍵盤相關的事件、 方法和屬性，可提供鍵盤狀態的相關資訊。The class provides keyboard-related events, methods, and properties that provide information regarding the state of the keyboard. 每個事件，定義所附加的事件也重新公開由基底項目類別和做為新的路由事件。Each of the events that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 一般而言，它會比較方便處理鍵盤事件的應用程式上和，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle keyboard events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 為了可接收鍵盤輸入的項目，項目必須是可設定焦點。In order for an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 大部分衍生的物件會根據預設可設定焦點。Most derived objects are focusable by default. 否則，若要讓項目可設定焦點，設定屬性的基底項目上`true`。Otherwise, to make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 基底的項目上的詳細資訊，請參閱[基底的項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 類別，例如和，設定的預設值至`false`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`. 因此，對於這些物件來取得鍵盤焦點必須設為`true`。Therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有只有一個項目具有鍵盤焦點在整個桌面上。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指在具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦點、 鍵盤焦點，以及邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 靜態成員類別委派到主要複本呼叫的執行緒，因此它們不一定是執行緒安全。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread, so they are not necessarily thread-safe. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來判斷索引鍵是否切換的狀態。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if a key is in the toggled state. 如果傳遞至是切換，會變更按鈕的背景。If the passed to is toggled, the background of a button is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardIsToggled](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardistoggled)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ClearFocus ();
.method public static hidebysig void ClearFocus() cil managed
Public Shared Sub ClearFocus ()
public: static void ClearFocus();

summary.span: 清除焦點。

span.span: Clears focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果焦點是在 Win32 視窗中，WPF 呼叫功能表關閉時的焦點的還原作業上的方法。If focus is within a Win32 window, WPF calls the method on restoration of focus when a menu is closed. 不論離開功能表模式會傳回 Win32 焦點至受裝載子系 HWND，且沒有任何項目 WPF 焦點。When leaving menu mode, Win32 focus is returned to the hosted child HWND, and no element has WPF focus.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode DefaultRestoreFocusMode { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode DefaultRestoreFocusMode
Public Shared Property DefaultRestoreFocusMode As RestoreFocusMode
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RestoreFocusMode DefaultRestoreFocusMode { System::Windows::Input::RestoreFocusMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::RestoreFocusMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 在還原焦點時的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] when restoring focus.

value.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 在還原焦點時之行為的列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] when restoring focus.
The default in .

Public Shared Function Focus (element As IInputElement) As IInputElement
public: static System::Windows::IInputElement ^ Focus(System::Windows::IInputElement ^ element);

param.name: element
param.span: 要在其上設定鍵盤焦點的項目。

span.span: The element on which to set keyboard focus.

summary.span: 設定鍵盤焦點於指定的項目上。

span.span: Sets keyboard focus on the specified element.
The element with keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可接收鍵盤輸入的項目，項目必須是可設定焦點。For an element to receive keyboard input, the element must be focusable. 若要讓項目可設定焦點，設定屬性的基底項目上`true`。To make an element focusable, set the property on the base element to `true`. 基底的項目上的詳細資訊，請參閱[基底的項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md). 類別，例如和，設定的預設值至`false`; 因此，這些物件來取得鍵盤焦點必須設為`true`。 classes, such as and , set the default value of to `false`; therefore, for these objects to obtain keyboard focus, must be set to `true`. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有只有一個項目具有鍵盤焦點在整個桌面上。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指在具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦點、 鍵盤焦點，以及邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有鍵盤焦點的項目也具有邏輯焦點的項目所屬的焦點領域。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有邏輯焦點的項目可能會或可能沒有鍵盤焦點。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，將鍵盤焦點設在。The following example shows a event handler that sets keyboard focus on a . [!code-csharp[focussample#FocusSampleSetFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#focussamplesetfocus)] [!code-vb[focussample#FocusSampleSetFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#focussamplesetfocus)]

summary.span: 取得擁有鍵盤焦點的項目。

span.span: Gets the element that has keyboard focus.
The focused element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的物件。Keyboard focus refers to the object that is receiving keyboard input. 具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設`true`。The element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 可以有只有一個項目具有鍵盤焦點在整個桌面上。There can be only one element with keyboard focus on the entire desktop. 邏輯焦點是指在具有焦點的焦點範圍內的物件。Logical focus refers to the object within a focus scope that has focus. 焦點、 鍵盤焦點，以及邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 具有鍵盤焦點的項目也具有邏輯焦點的項目所屬的焦點領域。An element with keyboard focus also has logical focus for the focus scope the element belongs to. 具有邏輯焦點的項目可能會或可能沒有鍵盤焦點。An element with logical focus may or may not have keyboard focus. ## Examples 下列範例會取得具有鍵盤焦點的項目，並將它轉換成。The following example gets the element with keyboard focus and casts it to a . 如果項目具有鍵盤焦點，變更項目的背景時。If the element with keyboard focus is a , the background of the element is changed. [!code-csharp[focussample#GetKeyboardFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#getkeyboardfocusedelement)] [!code-vb[focussample#GetKeyboardFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#getkeyboardfocusedelement)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.KeyStates GetKeyStates (System.Windows.Input.Key key);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.Input.KeyStates GetKeyStates(valuetype System.Windows.Input.Key key) cil managed
public: static System::Windows::Input::KeyStates GetKeyStates(System::Windows::Input::Key key);

param.name: key
param.span: 指定的索引鍵。

span.span: The specified key.

summary.span: 取得指定按鍵的按鍵狀態集。

span.span: Gets the set of key states for the specified key.
A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一個位元欄位列舉型別。因此，它可能會有多個狀態的索引鍵。 is a bit field enumeration; therefore, it is possible for a key to be in multiple states. 例如，索引鍵可能是按下狀態也是切換狀態。For example, a key could be in the pressed state as well as in the toggled state. 使用位元比較運算來判斷的狀態索引鍵的確切狀態。Use bit comparison operations to determine the exact state or states the key is in. 類別提供靜態方法，也可以用來取得索引鍵的狀態資訊的數字。The class provides a number of static methods which can also be used to obtain key state information. 方法是： ， ，和。The methods are: , , and . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來判斷索引鍵存在於狀態。The following example shows how to use the method to determine if the key is in the state. 位元 AND 運算來比較從傳回和狀態。A bit AND operation is used to compare the returned from and the state. 如果機碼下的背景變更。If the key is down, the background of a is changed. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyBoardGetKeyStates](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeyboardgetkeystates)]
